text_block_list.name: Bandaged Up Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: You're the one who came up with this crazy training!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer
text_block_list.text: I was doing it for you! I thought… it was the only way to achieve your dreams, to win the triple classic crown…!
It was a short while after I become a trainer at Tracen Academy. I came across the loud voices of a trainer and a horsegirl carrying a bunch of luggage.

text_block_list.name: Bandaged Up Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: If I'd known… I don't want it to end like this…… I wish I'd never met you……!
A trainer's skill determines how a horsegirl will develop. Their results, their abilities, their future. This event was a painful reminder—
The image of her tearful face would not leave my mind for some time.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Welcome, can I take your order?

text_block_list.name: Trainer Colleague
text_block_list.text: Two regular, please.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Thanks! Two regular for this table!
A few days later, I was visiting a nearby ramen place with a fellow trainer.

text_block_list.name: Trainer Colleague
text_block_list.text: I heard you're having second thoughts about scouting. What, have you lost your confidence?
choice_data_list:
Just realising their lives 
rest on my shoulders……

text_block_list.name: Trainer Colleague
text_block_list.text: …… Well, it's not like I don't understand you. All the horsegirls who come to the academy stake their whole lives on the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: …… …… "Trainers" have it rough too, huh.

text_block_list.name: Trainer Colleague
text_block_list.text: But hey, don't worry yourself sick. You won't be any better off without a job.
There's no use in dwelling on it. Start fresh tomorrow. As I tried to resolve myself to that while walking to the train station—

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Heeey, hold uuup～～～! You forgot your phone～!
The waiter girl came running and handed me…… A familiar looking smartphone.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Haah, I'm glad I caught up with you… Maaan, you should be more careful with this, it's full of personal information!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: You're lucky I'm not a bad person! Well then, be careful from now on!
Wanting to thank her properly, I rushed after her and—
(BONK)
Finding myself sitting on the sidewalk, I looked up at the utility pole that had hit me in the face.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: What was that sound?!
choice_data_list: Just… me facing things head on.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Head on… you mean this pole?!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Man… oh, man…… Pfft, pfahaha! Come on, first your phone and now this. How clumsy can you be! Aha, ahaha……!
Ines Fujin couldn't stop laughing for a bit… But then extended her right hand to me —

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: ― Haaaaah…… Think you can stand up?
She gently pulled me to my feet. One day some time later, our paths would cross again at an unexpected place.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ha, haah, haa……
Ines Fujin was leading the pack in a mock race. Already at the final corner, the horsegirls in the back were making their moves!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!
Overtaken, Ines Fujin looked completely different from the gentle girl I saw that evening. In her round eyes now a devious sparkle, her mouth curled like a predator on the hunt. And then—

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Daaaaahhhh!
"Don't take my lead"
So her back seemed to scream from the turf. With such ferocity, I could almost hear it.
― My eyes were glued to her. I wanted to see her future up close, I wanted to scout her as soon as possible and stepped forwards. But —
Suddenly, those words came to mind. Then, as if to drive home the point, the words and expression of that horsegirl followed.

text_block_list.name: Bandaged Up Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I wish I'd never met you……!
I stopped in my tracks…… and as various thoughts crossed my mind, Ines Fujin had left the grounds.
